[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.0.11″ global_colors_info=”{}” background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF90aXRsZSIsInNldHRpbmdzIjp7ImJlZm9yZSI6IiIsImFmdGVyIjoiIn19@” _builder_version=”4.6.0″ _dynamic_attributes=”title” title_text_align=”center” subhead_text_align=”center” background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_layout=”light” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”10px||10px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” title_font_size_tablet=”28px” title_font_size_phone=”22px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.6.0″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” z_index_tablet=”500″ box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.11″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.11″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.6″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  • All accepted papers, including workshops and Ph.D. forum, must have at least one “FULL” registration. A full registration is either a “member” or “non-member” registration. Student registrations are not considered full registrations.
  • All authors are required to register by 11th October 2021.
  • Rates are in NZD inclusive of GST.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.2″ _module_preset=”default” link_text_align=”center” ul_text_align=”center” ol_text_align=”center” quote_text_align=”center” header_text_align=”center” header_2_text_align=”center” header_3_text_align=”center” header_4_text_align=”center” header_5_text_align=”center” header_6_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Virtual Early Bird Registration 
(By 11 Oct 2021 PDT)
Amount
(NZD)
Member Fee 485.00
Non-Member Fee 585.00
Student IEEE Member Fee 270.00
Student Non-Member Fee 325.00

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.6″ _module_preset=”default” link_text_align=”center” ul_text_align=”center” ol_text_align=”center” quote_text_align=”center” header_text_align=”center” header_2_text_align=”center” header_3_text_align=”center” header_4_text_align=”center” header_5_text_align=”center” header_6_text_align=”center” text_orientation=”center” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Virtual Late Registration
(After 11 Oct 2021 PDT)
Amount
(NZD)
Member Fee 585.00
Non-Member Fee 705.00
Student IEEE Member Fee 410.00
Student Non-Member Fee 495.00

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://uoaevents.eventsair.com/icdm2021/registration” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Register here” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.6″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.6″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

For registration queries please contact: icdm2021@auckland.ac.nz

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
